welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Northwich, the charming town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves primarily low-cost and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Dedicated to long-haul and charter flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 60 minutes per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
